data.title: Crypto Market Outlook: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and XRP Tumble as BoJ Hawkishness Sparks Risk-Off Rout
data.description: Bitcoin slides below $87,000, Ethereum leans on $2,800 support and XRP hovers around $2.00 as December opens with a risk-off tone, leaving BTC eyeing $80,600–$74,508, ETH exposed to $2,111 and XRP to $1.90 unless buyers can turn key levels into a base for a rebound.
